comment:
Extracted Variables:
- x: number of light grilled cheese sandwiches
- y: number of heavy grilled cheese sandwiches

Definitions:
- x: number of light grilled cheese sandwiches to be made
- y: number of heavy grilled cheese sandwiches to be made

Extracted Constraints:
- 2x + 3y \leq 300 (bread constraint)
- 3x + 5y \leq 500 (cheese constraint)
- y \geq 3x (at least 3 times as many heavy sandwiches as light sandwiches)
- x \geq 0
- y \geq 0

Extracted Objective:
- Minimize 10x + 15y (total production time)
